content: this free 7 page mod kit contains everything you need to know to transform the medium sized weebee doll also a free pattern find it here 1 into an adorable baby wearing a onesie you will need to have a copy of the medium sized weebee doll pattern to complete this kit you can find the pattern here 3 when i make my medium sized weebee doll using worsted/4/aran/10ply weight yarn and a 3mm hook they stand at around 7 inches tall however other yarn weights and hooks can of course be used to create smaller or larger dolls all my dolls and clothing patterns can be found here 4 in my ravelry store due to the unexpected but wonderful popularity of my weebee dolls and clothing patterns there is now a dedicated facebook group which you can find here 5 weebee is named after my youngest niece phoebe - when she was first born my daughter and phoebe s older sister couldn t say her name properly yet and she has been nicknamed weebee ever since every effort has been made to ensure that this pattern is error free but i have very little time to spare i have a three year old lol so if you find any errors whatsoever in this pattern please do not hesitate to contact me and i will amend as soon as possible i hope you have as much fun crocheting this doll as i and many others have with the other weebee dolls 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/medium-sized-weebee-doll 2 https //www facebook com/groups/1590618731240406/ 3 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/medium-sized-weebee-doll 4 http //www ravelry com/designers/laura-tegg 5 https //www facebook com/groups/1590618731240406/
